root: ^Yars, you have enough energy for the cannon now!

paragraph_01: ^You need to get as far from the Quite as possible to activate the cannon.
paragraph_02: ^Once it is activated your next shot will fire the cannon.
paragraph_03: ^Remember, we cannot detect the Qotile so we are using your energy source to aim, guide us true.
paragraph_04: ^Oh, you should know be sure to get out of the way the cannon will kill you if it hits you!
